title: How to Survive Anywhere: A Guide for Urban, Suburban, Rural, and Wilderness Environments
description: Well-illustrated, easy-to-follow, step-by-step survival instructions Practical tips for anyone, anywhere, in almost any survival situation This unique book addresses the basic survival skills needed to keep you alive and healthy in the woods, suburbs, and city. Each chapter focuses on a primary area of concern--water, fire, food, shelter, clothing, tools, and weapons--describing in detail practices applicable to all environments. This one-of-a-kind guide provides real solutions to life-threatening situations caused by natural or man-made disasters, as well as the challenges encountered by anyone who wants to live more independently from modern systems, for a few days or a lifetime.
author: Christopher Nyerges
